text: Mikhail Sokovin (Russian, Михаил Алексеевич Соковнин, 18 October 1863 – 1943) was an Imperial Russian army commander. He served in China and fought in the war against the Empire of Japan. He was promoted to polkovnik (colonel) in April 1902 and major general in April 1908. ==Awards== *Order of Saint Stanislaus (House of Romanov), 3rd class, 1893 *Order of Saint Anna, 3rd class, 1896 *Order of Saint Stanislaus (House of Romanov), 2nd class, 1899 *Order of Saint Anna, 2nd class, 1900 *Order of Saint Vladimir, 4th class, 1902 *Order of Saint Vladimir, 3rd class (November 26, 1904) *Order of Saint Stanislaus (House of Romanov), 1st class (December 6, 1912) *Order of Saint Anna, 1st class, 1914 *Order of Saint Vladimir, 2nd class, 1916 *Order of the White Eagle (Russian Empire), 1917 ==References== ==External links== * Биография Соковнина М. title: Mikhail Sokovin
